Scroll Padding

# Scroll Padding

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                 | Support     |
| --------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
scroll-p-{n}
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-p-[n]
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-px-{n}
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-px-[n]
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-py-{n}
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-py-[n]
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-pt-{n}
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-pt-[n]
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-pr-{n}
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-pr-[n]
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-pb-{n}
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-pb-[n]
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-pl-{n}
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-pl-[n]
``` | 🌐 Web only |
